entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compilation error when using generics and static abstract members together #64763
  • [API Proposal]: `SyntaxTree.IsConditionallyDisabled(int position)` #64761
    C# 12.0

Closed

  • Looping between IDE0002 and CS0110. #64768
  • CS8602 false positive warning #64762
  • Incorrect var type deduction #64747
  • CS9057 The analyzer assembly references version '4.4.0.0' of the compiler, which is newer than the currently running version '4.3.0.0' #64754

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not realize member-symbols when producing the symbol-tree index. #64767
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify error message when attempting to ref a property #64764
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move the SymbolTree index cache off of the incremental-analyzer subsystem #64760
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64759
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64758
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64757
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Recover from the Exception in IdleProcessor #64746
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Refactor LSP server exit / shutdown / dispose logic for resiliency and clarity #64752
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Encoding serialization #64625
    Area-Compilers
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Report obsolete diagnostics for types named var/unmanaged/notnull #64717
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't format regions inside inactive conditionals #64551
    Area-IDE, Community
